MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G20 postcode areas of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6PM to safely carry out investigation work on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:36 PM on Tuesday, 26 January 2021.
